text.p: True or False: If square matrices [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] have the property that [mathjaxinline]AB = I[/mathjaxinline], then [mathjaxinline]BA = I[/mathjaxinline].

font.p: If two square matrices multiply to be the identity, then they are necessarily inverses of one another. This was proven as part of the Invertible Matrix Theorem.
